ELEMENT.AUTHOR: jt
ELEMENT.TITLE: Category: 7 col subcats
ELEMENT.SUMMARY: 7 columns of subcategories followed by a product list with a multipage format. Requires use of the zephyrsportscom_20100727 or newer theme.

ELEMENT.HELPER: Used to contain html lists of categories. JS function handles trimming to only 5 list items displayed and a more/less link as neeeded.

ELEMENT.HTML: • "entity"); print(); %>"><% load($cat_thumb); default(""); image(w=>"120",h=>"120",tag=>"1",bg=>"FFFFFF",alt=>$cat_pretty); print(); %> <% load($cat_pretty); default(""); print(); %>

<%
loadurp("VAR::hidecatthumbs"); default("");
goto(label=>"HIDECATEGORIES",gt=>"0");
	print("%PAGE_SUBCATS_HEADER%%PAGE_SUBCATS_WITH_THUMBS%");
	stop();

:HIDECATEGORIES();
	print("<!-- categories are hidden due to uri param -->");
%>

ELEMENT.PROMPT: Description for top of page UNDER CAT LISTS

ELEMENT.HTML: <select name='brand' id='brand' class='zform_select' style=' font-size:10px;' onchange="window.open(this.options[this.selectedIndex].value,'_top')"> <option value=''>Sort By %SORTBY_VAR%</option> <!-- CATEGORY --> <option value='<%load($cat_url); default(''); print();%>'><% load($cat_pretty); default(""); print(); %></option> <!-- /CATEGORY --> </select>

<% print(""); /* load each tag and see if it is set. If so, display a sticker. If not, skip to the next tag. */ load($is:specialorder); default(""); goto(label=>"SKIP_SPECIALORDER",ne=>"1"); image(src=>"/tags/small/specialorder",h=>"25",w=>"125",bg=>"TTTTTT",tag=>"1",alt=>"Special Order"); print(); stop(); :SKIP_SPECIALORDER(); load($is:preorder); default(""); goto(label=>"SKIP_PREORDER",ne=>"1"); image(src=>"/tags/small/preorder",h=>"25",w=>"125",bg=>"TTTTTT",tag=>"1",alt=>"Preorder"); print(); stop(); :SKIP_PREORDER(); /* user2 = packagedeal */ load($is:user2); default(""); goto(label=>"SKIP_USER2",ne=>"1"); image(src=>"/tags/small/packagedeal",h=>"25",w=>"125",bg=>"TTTTTT",tag=>"1",alt=>"Package Deal"); print(); stop(); :SKIP_USER2(); /* user1 = clearance */ load($is:user1); default(""); goto(label=>"SKIP_USER1",ne=>"1"); image(src=>"/tags/small/clearance",h=>"25",w=>"125",bg=>"TTTTTT",tag=>"1",alt=>"Clearance"); print(); stop(); :SKIP_USER1(); load($is:newarrival); default(""); goto(label=>"SKIP_NEWARRIVAL",ne=>"1"); image(src=>"/tags/small/newarrival",h=>"25",w=>"125",bg=>"TTTTTT",tag=>"1",alt=>"New Arrival"); print(); stop(); :SKIP_NEWARRIVAL(); load($is:sale); default(""); goto(label=>"SKIP_SALE",ne=>"1"); image(src=>"/tags/small/sale",h=>"25",w=>"125",bg=>"TTTTTT",tag=>"1",alt=>"Sale"); print(); stop(); :SKIP_SALE(); load($is:bestseller); default(""); goto(label=>"SKIP_BESTSELLER",ne=>"1"); image(src=>"/tags/small/bestseller",h=>"25",w=>"125",bg=>"TTTTTT",tag=>"1",alt=>"Best Seller"); print(); stop(); :SKIP_BESTSELLER(); print(""); %>
<% load($zoovy:prod_thumb); default(""); default($zoovy:prod_image1); image(w=>"150",h=>"150",tag=>"1",alt=>$zoovy:prod_name); print(); %>
<% load($zoovy:prod_name); default(""); print(); %>
<% load($is:sale); default(""); goto(label=>"ISSALE",eq=>"1"); print("Zephyr Low Price:"); stop(); :ISSALE(); print("Zephyr Sale Price:"); %> <% load($zoovy:base_price); default(""); format(money); print(); %>
<% print(""); /* the div around the price is closed at the start of the MSRP div OR at the very end. */ loadurp("product:zoovy:prod_show_no_price"); default(""); goto(label=>"DISABLEDPRICE",ne=>""); loadurp("product:zoovy:base_price"); set($price=>$_); /* if the msrp is blank or the - price is less than 0, do not display savings */ loadurp("product:zoovy:prod_msrp"); stop(unless=>$_); goto(label=>"END",lt=>$price); goto(label=>"END",eq=>$price); set($MSRP=>$_); load($MSRP); math(op=>"subtract",var=>$price); /* don't show savings of less than one dollar */ goto(label=>"END",lt=>"1"); format(hidezero); format(money); format(pretext=>"Save: ",posttext=>""); print(); load($zoovy:prod_msrp); stop(unless=>$_); set($MSRP=>$_); load($zoovy:base_price); math(op=>"divide",var=>$MSRP); math(op=>"subtract",var=>"1"); math(op=>"multiply",var=>"-100"); format(hidezero); format(convert=>"number",precision=>"0"); format(pretext=>" (",posttext=>"%)"); print(); :END(); :DISABLEDPRICE(); %>
ELEMENT.MULTIPAGE_HEADER:
<% print(""); /* the header is a little different based on whether or not multiple pages are present */ load($TOTALPAGES); default("1"); goto(label=>"MULTIPAGES",ne=>"1"); print("Displaying "); print($TOTALPRODUCTS); print(" items"); stop(); :MULTIPAGES(); /* outputs: displaying items X - Y of Z items. */ /* used to set X (see example above) */ loadurp("VAR::size"); default("30"); set($VSIZE=>$_); /* used to generate Y. If Y is greater than Z, Z is used for Y (this could occur on the last page of multipage) */ loadurp("VAR::p"); default("1"); math(op=>"multiply",var=>$VSIZE); set($LASTPROD=>$_); goto(label=>"NOTLASTPAGE",lt=>$TOTALPRODUCTS); set($LASTPROD=>$TOTALPRODUCTS); :NOTLASTPAGE(); math(op=>"subtract",var=>$VSIZE); math(op=>"add",var=>"1"); format(pretext=>"Displaying ",posttext=>" - "); format(posttext=>$LASTPROD); format(posttext=>" of "); format(posttext=>$TOTALPRODUCTS); format(posttext=>" items"); print(); %>
<% /* if any URI variables exist, preserve them. */ /* this is the default behavior of the auto-generated links, so this is for behavioral consistency. */ /* only params that are NOT p, size or sortby are preserved because sortby and size are in the form and P should be reset each time this form is submitted */ print(""); urivars(); stop(unless=>$_); load("sortby,p,size"); set($urivariables=>$_); urivars(blacklist=>$urivariables); stop(unless=>$_); pull(stack=>>$PARAMSTACK,format=>"textlist",delimiter=>"=",p0=>"KEY",p1=>"VALUE",linedelimiter=>"&"); count(stack=>>$PARAMSTACK); :PARAMLOOP(); pop(stack=>>$PARAMSTACK,namespace=>"PARAM"); print(" "); goto(nb=>$PARAMSTACK,label=>"PARAMLOOP"); %> %SUBCAT2%
<% /* outputs the previous page link IF the first page of products isnt loaded */ print(""); loadurp("VAR::p"); default("1"); goto(ne=>"1",label=>"PREVIOUS"); stop(); :PREVIOUS(); print("
« Previous
"); %>
<% load($PAGELINKS); default(""); print(); %>
 <% /* outputs the next page link IF the last page of products isnt loaded and there is more than one page total */ print(""); load($TOTALPAGES); default("1"); goto(label=>"MULTIPAGES",ne=>"1"); stop(); :MULTIPAGES(); loadurp("VAR::p"); default("1"); /* if we are on the last page do NOT show the link to the next page */ goto(ne=>$TOTALPAGES,label=>"NEXT"); stop(); :NEXT(); print("
Next »
"); %>
ELEMENT.INIT:
<%

/* override the default INI values here. this gets preprocessed.  */

loadurp("VAR::size"); default($SIZE); initset(SIZE=>$_);
loadurp("VAR::sortby"); default($SORTBY); initset(SORTBY=>$_);

%>
ELEMENT.MULTIPAGE_FOOTER:
<% /* outputs the previous page link IF the first page of products isnt loaded */ print(""); loadurp("VAR::p"); default("1"); goto(ne=>"1",label=>"PREVIOUS"); stop(); :PREVIOUS(); print("
« Previous
"); %>
<% load($PAGELINKS); default(""); print(); %>
 <% /* outputs the next page link IF the last page of products isnt loaded and there is more than one page total */ print(""); load($TOTALPAGES); default("1"); goto(label=>"MULTIPAGES",ne=>"1"); stop(); :MULTIPAGES(); loadurp("VAR::p"); default("1"); /* if we are on the last page do NOT show the link to the next page */ goto(ne=>$TOTALPAGES,label=>"NEXT"); stop(); :NEXT(); print("
Next »
"); %>

<script type="text/javascript">
$(function() {
	$('#slideshow').cycle({
		fx:     'zoom',
		speed:  'slow',
		timeout: 5000,
		slideExpr: 'li',
		pager:  '#slideshowNav'
		});
	});
</script>
